name: Harvest Time (itch) (malceore)
description:
Harvest Time was created for Ludum Dare 52, the theme was harvest. Warning game contains graphic violence and goons. Your goal is to collect corpses, harvest their organs for enough money to build an orphanage.

Credits:

  • Artist - Kaitie Wood
  • Programmer - Brandon Wood
  • Sound/Music - Ben Keane

Source Code: https://github.com/HelmetBugg/OrganHarvester
